Name: R. Sampath Raj
Tweet: Just learnt that Col M B  Ravindranath, VrC CO 2 RAJRIF during OP VIJAY passed away at Bangalore due to massive heart attack. We have lost a great soldier,  human being & a true legend. May his soul rest in peace & God give strength to his family to bear this irrevocable loss....  https://t.co/Vwbxn1ma2h
